Underwear.js

Showing your underscore in public can be embarrassing.

Underscore.js is a great library, but I prefer to extend the native prototypes with these methods. With Underwear.js, you can use the greatness of underscore.js from the comfort of your own objects.

Underwear translates all the Underscore methods to the native JavaScript prototypes. For those who prefer not to see skid marks in their code ;)

With Underwear you can do this:

[1, 2, 3].each(function(n) { alert(n); });

Instead of this:

_([1, 2, 3]).each(function(n) { alert(n); });

Or this:

_.each([1, 2, 3], function(n) { alert(n); });

Put on some underwear

Underwear.min.js (production 30k) Underwear.js (development 39k) View on GitHub
